page.title: 07CHILDREN'S GAMES 2
page.content: (ROUNDERS CONTINUED)TO SCORE A ROUNDER YOU HAVE TO RUN ROUND THE TRACK.IF SOMEONE CATCHES YOU WITHOUT THE BALL TOUCHING THE GROUND YOUR OUT.IF YOU HIT THE BALL BEHIND YOUR ONLY ALLOWED TO FIRST BASE,BUT IF YOU MISS IT YOU CAN RUN ALL THE WAY AROUND. {KINGBALL} IN KINGBALL THERE ARE TWO TEAMS,ONE TE AM STANDS AT ONE END OF THE YARD AND THE OTHER AT THE OTHER END.THERE IS A CENTRE LINE WHICH SEPARATES THE TWO TEAMS.THE PERSON WITH THE BALL CANNOT CROSS THE LINE,HE THROWS IT AT THEIR LEGS.IF THE BALL HITS HIS LOWER LEGS THEN HE HAS TO GO IN THE OTHER TEAM'S END IN A SEMI CIRCLE.WE HAVE TO THROW THE BALL TO HIM IN THE SEMI CIRCLE, AND HE HAS TO HIT THE OTHER TEAM'S LEGS IF HE DOES HE IS ALLOWED TO COME BACK TO OUR SIDE.
